overview: If you like 'em uncut, this video will be your favorite for a long time. TOURIST TRADE has tons of foreskin play, docking and general worship that us "cut" guys have come to seek out. This six sex scene scorcher was shot on location in the Bavarian Alps and features a cast of four hot American studs paired with seven German newcomers. The climactic orgy will leave you spent (if you get that far the first time through).
title: Tourist Trade
